text: <@U026103R3>: <@U026PHQ3J>  - the JSON object of a user on the server is returned as an array - that's good news - this is the only thing at the moment where I am seeing a server side impact and it is resulting in no impact.   We would need to further double check how badges are counted/awarded just to make sure they are aggregate across children
<@U0289USNA> from what I can tell, everything is childId bound
badges and badge progress are counted on the user though, so it would be aggregate across children.
i can help if you need more insight on how badges are counted and awarded
<@U02613K0X>, thats actually enough info for this call
<@U02613K0X>: that was their first question, actually
